locations.name: Lucia and Andres's Bedroom
locations.description: A modern apartment bedroom in Bucaramanga, Colombia. Queen bed with white and mint green bedding, two wooden nightstands, reading lamp on Lucia's side with a stack of novels, architecture magazines on Andres's side. Small vanity with mirror, makeup, and glasses case. Closet with teaching clothes (blouses, pants, skirts) and Andres's work clothes. Window overlooking Bucaramanga hills with morning light. Ceiling fan overhead. Potted plant (small fern) on the windowsill. Digital alarm clock on nightstand. Warm, tidy adult bedroom.

locations.name: Apartment Bathroom

Lucia's glasses case on counter near sink, hair ties and clips in a small basket, small makeup bag. Two toothbrushes in a cup (his and hers). Tile floor, bright overhead light, small frosted window for ventilation. Clean towels on a rack. Modest, functional, well-kept bathroom.

locations.name: Lucia's 3rd Grade Classroom
locations.description: A 3rd grade classroom in a public elementary school in Bucaramanga, Colombia. Teacher's wooden desk at the front with a grade book, pen cup, and small plant. Large whiteboard with colored markers and eraser. 25 small student desks and chairs arranged in rows. Alphabet poster and numbers poster on walls. Class schedule chart near the door. Colombian flag displayed. Student artwork pinned on a bulletin board. Pencil sharpener mounted on wall. Small class library corner with a bookshelf and floor cushions. Globe on a shelf. Sticker reward chart near the whiteboard. Windows along one wall showing Bucaramanga hills and palm trees. Bright, organized, cheerful learning space.
